videos.title: Why SQLite is Taking Over
videos.description: Deep dive into SQLite's architecture and why it's becoming the default database for modern applications. Explore how this lightweight database is powering everything from mobile apps to edge computing.

videos.title: The Economics of Open Source
videos.description: How do open source projects sustain themselves financially? This video explores various business models, from dual licensing to foundation support, and what makes them work.

videos.title: Understanding System Design Trade-offs
videos.description: Every system design decision involves trade-offs. Learn how to think about consistency, availability, and partition tolerance when building distributed systems.
